docs.snippet: Chatter on social media outlets like Twitter helps encourage Super Bowl advertisers to release commercials early to whet consumers’ appetite for the game-day ads....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chatter on social media outlets like Twitter helps encourage Super Bowl advertisers to release commercials early to whet consumers’ appetite for the game-day ads.
docs.abstract: Advertising column; advertisers are taking page from Hollywood, releasing teasers and previews of commercials for upcoming Super Bowl; chatter on social media is encouraging marketers to shift strategy and release commercials early to whet consumers’ appetite for game-day ads.

headline.main: With Previews, Super Bowl Advertisers Borrow From Hollywood

docs.snippet: Ask Brazilians how their national team will fare at the World Cup and chances are they will predict a run at least to the July 13 final, if not a win. Understandable optimism, given that Brazil will be playing at home and has won more World Cups (...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ask Brazilians how their national team will fare at the World Cup and chances are they will predict a run at least to the July 13 final, if not a win. Understandable optimism, given that Brazil will be playing at home and has won more World Cups (five) than any other soccer power.

headline.main: What Happens if Brazil Doesn't Win Its World Cup?
